_sText:
**Short Description**


This map was inspired by "Mega Zone" Lazer quest arena in Leicster and i loosley based it around that. it is quite a dark map but it looks cool and gameplay is very fast so i advise GG Turbo :)

**Features**


1. unique spawn zones which prevent Spawn Camping
2. cool neon textures and Custom Dev textures
3. balconies for each team and a HIGHWAY to walk on (careful no cover on these)
4. cool Glass feature using custom glass textures

**credits**

Dev Textures............zaoman
Glass Textures..........LODYblokady
Neon Textures...........ShoX*!

**installation**

just copy the BSP file to your C:/Programfiles/steam/steamapps/USERID/counterstrike:source/cstrike/maps

or if you wanna run it on your server..... im sure you admins know what to do, tbh i forgot :)


thanks for looking and i hope you enjoy my map :)
